ABOUT ME

Hey there! My name is Akshata. I am an application developer, working at the National University of Singapore. Architect by training and a technologist by passion, I often find myself wandering in the murky cusp between science and art. If I am not coding, you'll find me thinking, making or lusting after food! Cheers!
